1.content: Are you going feral or anthro?
1.title: Choose a style

11.content: Here’s a selection of furries for you.
11.title: Feral

1211.content:
Okay domestic it is, now here are two domestic anthropomorphic dogs that you can choose from or you can come up with your own domestic anthropomorphic dog characters.

First up is Shep a heroic good Airedale animated anthropomorphic dog who was a one time star for Warner Bros Animation and also is from Hollywood California as Shep one day goes for a swim in a radioactive lake as he then turns into a giant fat monster superhero and goes into the superhero business as Super Mutt.

Next up is Dr. Strangedog who happens to be an animated anthropomorphic chihuahua and also happens to be a well known and respected scientist that lives in a mansion located somewhere in New York City New York as he himself one day was working on an experiment in his mansion's laboratory involving cookie dough and radiation as he of course tries a sample of his highly irradiated cookie dough as he transforms into a gigantic fat dough monster after outgrowing his mansion known as the Doggy DoughDog who would love to either share his experiment with the world or perhaps travel around the world as a fat giant superhero as well.
1211.title: Domestic

choices: Undergo giant fat monster superhero training.
12111.content:
Today for all of you fellow readers and audiences around the world that are watching, you're about to hear the story of a one time star who worked for Warner Bros animation back in the 1940's who one day decides to go for a swim in a radioactive lake somewhere outside of Tinseltown A.K.A Hollywood California as yours truly transforms into a giant fat monster superhero known as the mutt of steel Super Mutt. Now then it's time for this giant fat monster superhero origin story to begin and for me to hero up when it's time!

It all started one bright beautiful sunny day in Tinseltown A.K.A Hollywood California on August 25th 1945 as yours truly had completed a one animated picture deal with Warner Bros Animation as yours truly left the set and walked off of the studio lot with my head held high along with feeling confident and full of self esteem.

As I was walking on some sidewalks down the streets of Hollywood California word of a lake full of radioactive materials that was outside of Hollywood California had spread like wildfire as I knew I had to go see it for myself.

"A lake full of radioactive materials that's outside of Hollywood California eh? Hmm I better go and investigate this lake that's outside of Hollywood as it's full of radioactive materials." I said as yours truly Shep a mild mannered one time animated star was about to begin his investigation of this radioactive lake that was located outside of Hollywood California.

Early that evening I then made it over to where the radioactive lake was located as I then stepped into the radioactive lake itself.

"Something about swimming in a radioactive lake doesn't seem right, wait-w-w-w-what's happening to me?! My voice is becoming deeper and booming as I'm growing larger and getting fatter as well!!" I said as my transformation into a giant fat monster superhero was already underway as I grew to be about 150 times my own size as I was now wearing what appeared to be a giant sized Superman like costume that came with a cape on the back of it along with a mask for me to wear as well as my hair's shape had become super stylish as well.

"What's happened to me? And what's up with this Superman like costume that I'm wearing along with this mask that I'm wearing as well? Also why do I feel like fighting a never ending battle for truth justice and the American way? It's because of that radioactive lake that I have transformed into a giant fat monster superhero, as I now need to come up with a name for my heroic alter ego hmm perhaps Super Mutt apparently has got a good ring to it, that's it I am now known as Super Mutt." I said as I couldn't believe what I had transformed into as I felt the need to fight a never ending battle of truth justice and the American way.

Now what will I do next?
12111.title: Shep A.K.A Super Mutt.

1242.content:
Her name is Erica and she is a black dragon sorceress who is an traveler, exploring the world and learn from many magic users along the way. She's is very come, intelligent and sometimes very mischievous when she is around other men.

However during her travels she end up shipwreck on a random island without any knowledge where she's at.
1242.title: Female

choices: The entire people of mice shown up
12421.content:
A small mouse lad who was off to scout the entire beach, checking if anything out of the ordinary. He explored few times in small caves which then later regret when he notice few bats upon them. Despite few troubles along his way however until he notice a strange creature up ahead near the shore, almost like a dragon girl but rather massive giant.

He notice that the black dragon giantess was wearing two piece of clothing, one was a leather breast plate and a loincloth although it was tatter and damaged due to being in the water for to long. The dragoness has a long black hair with mix of dreadlocks, a sliver chocker, two sliver bracelets which almost looked like cuffs and lastly a damaged of pair of Roman-sandals.

The lad couldn't stop staring at her massive frame but what he couldn't help is.... the boobs; the dragoness breast was rather the eye of his prize. However he doesn't have time for playing around, he must tell the others about the giant lay dormant on their land.
12421.title: Erica's Travels
